title: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: Currently, when the data set editor is opened, the entire schema is queried, and it takes some time to load. Eventually, a message appears stating 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list.'
EB: The expected behavior is that the load of the tree should be deferred until the user either expands the tree or applies a filter. This would improve the loading time and user experience. Bug 101372 requests the ability to filter based on schema.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor for a SQL Query.
2. Observe that the entire schema is queried and loading takes time.
3. Eventually, you will see the message 'Only 500 items can be viewed in the available list.'
